byline.original: By MICHAEL S. SCHMIDT and SCOTT SHANE

abstract: Chart compares remarks made by Hillary Rodham Clinton when she first addressed her use of personal email account during her tenure at State Dept, and statements from FBI Dir James B Comey following conclusion of investigation.

headline.print_headline: Clinton Versus the F.B.I.:  4 Divergent Statements
headline.main: Hillary Clinton v. the F.B.I.: What They Said About Her Emails

snippet: Mrs. Clinton first addressed her use of a private email account last year; here is how her statements compare to the F.B.I. findings from an investigation released Tuesday....
lead_paragraph: Mrs. Clinton first addressed her use of a private email account last year; here is how her statements compare to the F.B.I. findings from an investigation released Tuesday.
